description: The Discovery Mountain Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry brings you the latest snow fall, snow surface conditions,  base depth, trail, and lift operations information.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask Discovery Mountain for the snow report
Alexa, ask Discovery Mountain for latest conditions

name: Snow Report for Discovery Mountain
shortDescription: The Discovery Mountain Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry provides the latest ski and snowboarding conditions for Discovery Mountain.
